sentences.sentence: What was happening I could not very well make out, but would keep staring at the rows of lighted casements from my place in the darkness.
sentences.translation: 那里在发生什么事我不可能琢磨清楚，但我还是从我在暗处的地方继续盯着一排排灯火明亮的玻璃窗。

sentences.sentence: That wall is not thick enough to have that crawl space inside it. Look. There are windows above the gargoyle heads. Those casements are not six feet thick.
sentences.translation: 那面墙不够厚，内部能容得下一个槽隙。看。那些怪兽头上的窗户。那些窗扉没有六尺厚。

sentences.sentence: Little was visible but squares of a dusky orange-red on either side of the street, where the firelight or lamplight of each cottage overflowed through the casements into the dark world without.
sentences.translation: 除了街道两边昏暗的橘红色方块，几乎什么也看不见。透过那些窗子，每间农舍里的炉火光和灯光，涌流到外面黑洞洞的世界。
